GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Well! <sp:5:1:0>Never thought I'd run into someone
else all the way out here.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>This cliff crumbled during <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>,
so this is as far as anyone can go.

It's so bad that it put <clr:0000>Gerudo Canyon
Stable<clr:ffff> up ahead out of business.

If you were hoping to find a place to rest
and restock, <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar <clr:ffff>out <clr:0000>toward
the desert <clr:ffff>is your only option.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But the temperature in the desert shifts
from <clr:0000>extreme heat to extreme cold<clr:ffff>, and
walking through sand is a challenge.
If you want to cook something to prepare
yourself, you're welcome to use my pot.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Traveling in the desert is really tough.


Take one step off the road and you'll be
up to your knees in sand. If you plan on
walking, plan on walking slow.
Honestly, it almost makes me wish I'd
thought ahead and borrowed a <clr:0000>sand seal<clr:ffff>
right at the start.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But I swore to myself that I was going to
take this investigation one step at a time,<sp:5:1:0>
and I meant that literally.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>I still can't believe the ravine road is
blocked. The Upheaval messed things
up even worse than I imagined.
If you need to get to the Digdogg
Suspension Bridge, you're going to
have to use the new road.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_00>That really surprised me there...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk about ferocious.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_01>The old cliff in this area crumbled during
the Upheaval.

The debris completely blocked off the
road I used to walk.

Luckily, they made a new one. If you're
going to the Digdogg Suspension Bridge,
use that.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>I didn't come all this way only for my
investigation to end up half-baked.<sp:0:4:0>Even if the sand trips me up and the
wild temperature changes alternately
freeze and fry me...
I swear I'll unlock the mysteries of
that <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff>!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>It's a good thing you swooped in when
you did! You saved me!

Here, let me give you a little something to
thank you.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You came to see the <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff> too?<sp:0:4:0>Well, this is the perfect spot. There's a
<clr:0000>clear view of the whole thing<clr:ffff> from here.<sp:0:4:0>I just...don't know what it's supposed to
depict.<sp:5:1:0> It looks kind of like a person. <sp:5:1:0>Or
maybe a monster?<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I want to get closer, but walking through
the desert is tough, especially with the
extreme temperature fluctuations.
If you try heading over there, make sure
you're well prepared.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Phew... I have to admit, that took me
by surprise.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What's up?<sp:5:0:0> Ah, that <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff> really has a
hold on you, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I just wish I knew what it depicted. It's
sort of person-like...<sp:5:1:0>but also sort of
monster-like too.<sp:5:1:0>
I want to get closer, but with these wild
temperature fluctuations, walking through
all that sand would be misery.
If you go, just make sure you're prepared.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Th-that was kind of scary. I wasn't
expecting an attack.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Painful_00>Ngh... I didn't expect an attack here.<sp:5:0:0>
I can't drive them away!
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Painful>Ugh. How'd I end up in a mess like this?
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Phew... <sp:5:1:0> I finally made it.<sp:0:4:0>You did too, huh? Great work.<sp:0:4:0>The desert has a way of tripping you up.
Traveling through it takes time, even in
the best of circumstances.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm guessing you're here to see
the <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>So am I! Want to go take a look at
it together?
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I think I'll rest a little longer and then
set out.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>I'm not really looking forward to trudging
through the <clr:0000>desert sands<clr:ffff> or dealing with
<clr:0000>Gerudo Canyon<clr:ffff> elevation differences.
But maybe the <clr:0000>extreme temperature
changes between day and night<clr:ffff> will
distract me from all that...
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_01>Oh?<sp:5:1:0> Hey, are you lost?<sp:0:4:0>If you're looking for Gerudo Canyon
Stable, I'm afraid it's closed.<sp:0:4:0>If you need to rest, your only real option
now is <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>, which is down
this road toward the desert.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As for me, I've got a <clr:0000>geoglyph <clr:ffff>to
investigate, so that's where I'm headed.<sp:0:4:0>Who knows? Maybe I'll see you again.
Near_GoRange_02: I should rent a sand seal...
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Sand seals<clr:ffff> can move really fast in the
desert. It's like they're swimming over
the dunes!
I won't be doing any of that though. Just
trudging along, my feet sinking into the
sand. All for my investigation...
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Ugh, that was so scary. Once they
attacked, I didn't know what to do...
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_00>How awful, attacking me out of the blue...
I couldn't even fight back.
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Phew... I'm taking a little break.<sp:0:4:0>Honestly, you should too. Getting here
can't have been easy.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>As if the <clr:0000>desert sand<clr:ffff> isn't bad enough,
the elevation differences in <clr:0000>Gerudo
Canyon<clr:ffff> really take it out of you.
Then there's the<clr:0000> harsh heat of the day
and biting cold of the night<clr:ffff>. If I weren't
pacing myself, I'd probably keel over.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's important to listen to your body, and
that includes resting once in a while!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The nearby Gerudo Canyon Stable isn't
accepting visitors anymore.<sp:0:4:0>So if you need rest, why not follow the
road to the desert and make your way
to <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>?
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Meanwhile, I'll be heading over to the
<clr:0000>geoglyph <clr:ffff>for a little eyes-on research.<sp:0:4:0>See you again, maybe?
SavedLv2_01: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Angry_00>Good grief! I was in big trouble!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Crumbling cliffsides, <clr:0000>extreme shifts in
temperature<clr:ffff>... Did anything escape the
effects of <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>?
<clr:0000>Gerudo Canyon Stable <clr:ffff>couldn't get
enough customers to keep itself
afloat anymore.<sp:0:4:0>If you're looking for someplace to stock
up and collect yourself, head <clr:0000>toward the
desert<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Pat yourself on the back for making it
here. That's no mean feat.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Tired_00>*pant* *pant* That was no joke. I was in
real trouble there...
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Scare>Wh-what can we do against a monster
like this?!
